page.title: 06Hillards
page.content: Hillards is the largest supermarket in Batley.It employs over 250 staff doing a great variety of jobs,from manager,to checkout operator,to shelf fillers. The supermarket is conveniently situated on the main shopping street(Commercial Street).It has two floors.The top floor sells a variety of non-food goods such as books,shoes,clothes and wallpaper.The bottom floor sells all types of food ,and has over a dozen checkouts. The store has many other benifits.It is served by a large car-park.It also has a petrol station(selling petrol cheaper than most other petrol stations).You can also cash cheques for up to Â£50 at the store.Hillards like many other large supermarkets stays openlate on Wednesdays,Thursdays and Fridays(8.00 p.m.)
